protocol.name: P-G9311-1
protocol.text: WS plants were grown at 22C under 16h light and 8 hour dark cycle.

protocol.name: P-G9311-2
protocol.text: Root samples were transferred to liquid nitrogen before RNA extraction.

protocol.name: P-G9311-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 microg total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G9311-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was prepared using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-G9311-5
protocol.text: WS plants were grown at 22C under 16h light and 8 hour dark cycle. Plants were grown on 40 micromolar selenate.
